description: This file defines functions and classes for a Tic Tac Toe game where two AI agents play against each other. It includes model selection logic for different AI providers and a function to instantiate the game players with detailed instructions.

methods.name: get_model_for_provider
methods.description: Creates and returns an AI model instance based on the specified provider and model name.

methods.name: get_tic_tac_toe_players
methods.description: Returns two AI agent instances configured to play Tic Tac Toe against each other.
